1.0.name: wordpress/prezi-shortcode
1.0.description:
Adds an easy way to embed Prezi presentations in your blog posts and pages by using the [prezi] shortcode. Prezi Shortcode also adds a custom button to the Visual Editor, so you don't have to remember the codes.

Example use:

[prezi]http://prezi.com/123518/view/[/prezi]

You can also use custom width and height:

[prezi width="600" height="400"]http://prezi.com/123518/view/[/prezi]
